column5: An article by Roy MacGregor in the Globe and Mail on the Muskoka River:  http://www.theglobeandmail.com/news/national/along-ontarios-idyllic-muskoka-river-locals-fight-dam-development/article25814523/
Cool article! I can agree a summer in Pittsburgh is probably hell on earth! LOL, but so is one in Cleveland.
great read.  I worked on lake muskoka as a kid and we often fished the river.  I didn't know most of the facts about the river in this article.  Cheers!
